title: The Man in the middle
creator_credit: Fred Moore, Millbank Films and British Productivity Council
brief_description: The supervisor is sandwiched in the no-man’s land between “them and us”. Intended for training supervisors, the film illustrates that they are required to maintain full production and look after the health, safety and welfare of the employees.
creator_credit_for_label: Fred Moore, Millbank Films and British Productivity Council
